channel.title: Wasted Words
channel.itunes:subtitle: A less sober perspective on the world's events and issues
channel.itunes:author: Wasted Words
channel.itunes:summary: The weekly panel discussion show where everyone is drunk and nobody knows what they're talking about, providing a less sober perspective on any and all topics, from politics to pop culture. Hosted by RJ White, featuring Shek Baker, Andrew Lin, Stephen Levinson, Olivia Todd and occasional guest panelists.

item.title: Wasted Words Special: The feed's moved, please listen
item.itunes:author: Wasted Words
item.itunes:subtitle: Wasted Words Special Message
item.itunes:summary: A special message from host RJ White about the new location of the audio feed.
item.itunes:keywords: Drinking, discussion, politics, pop culture, humor, talk, music, current events

item.title: Wasted Words 86: The Mill Avenue Scene
item.itunes:author: Wasted Words
item.itunes:subtitle: Wasted Words, show 86: Hometowns, Gin Blossoms, politics
item.itunes:summary: Wasted Words makes its first political endorsement! Steve Murray for Mayor or Burgher of Toronto (murray4mayor.biz)! Then, Stephen asks Shek, Andrew, Leonard and RJ how their hometowns shaped who they are today. Also- "Say, What's Good?", the early 90s Phoenix music scene, mall food of the past , the Dayton Peace Accords and angels.
item.itunes:keywords: Drinking, discussion, politics, pop culture, humor, talk, music, current events
